column2: What are you about? shouted Rostov, looking at him in an ecstasy of exasperation.
column3: What are you about? shouted Rostov, looking at him in an ecstasy of exasperation.

column2: Don't you hear it's His Majesty the Emperor's health?
column3: Don't you hear it's His Majesty the Emperor's health?

column2: Why don't you renew the acquaintance? said Dolokhov to Rostov.
column3: Why don't you renew the acquaintance? said Dolokhov to Rostov.

column2: Here's to the health of lovely women, Peterkin--and their lovers! he added.
column3: Here's to the health of lovely women, Peterkin-and their lovers! he added.

column2: How dare you take it? he shouted.
column3: How dare you take it? he shouted.

column2: What are you about?" whispered their frightened voices.
column3: What are you about?" whispered their frightened voices.

column2: You...! you... scoundrel!	You...! you... scoundrel!
I challenge you!" he ejaculated, and, pushing back his chair, he rose from the table.
column3: I challenge you!" he ejaculated, and, pushing back his chair, he rose from the table.

column2: Well then, till tomorrow at Sokolniki, said Dolokhov, as he took leave of Rostov in the club porch.
column3: Well then, till tomorrow at Sokolniki, said Dolokhov, as he took leave of Rostov in the club porch.

column2: And do you feel quite calm? Rostov asked.
column3: And do you feel quite calm? Rostov asked.

column2: Can't I go away from here, run away, bury myself somewhere?" passed through his mind.
column3: Can't I go away from here, run away, bury myself somewhere?" passed through his mind.

column2: Oh yes, it is horribly stupid, said Pierre.
column3: Oh yes, it is horribly stupid, said Pierre.

column2: It's all the same....	It's all the same....
